text: Lavender () is a 1953 Austrian-German comedy film directed by Arthur Maria Rabenalt and starring Gretl Schörg, Karl Schönböck, and Hans Holt. It was made at the Schönbrunn Studios in Vienna. The film's sets were designed by Felix Smetana. ==Cast== ==References == == Bibliography == * == External links == * Category:1953 films Category:1953 comedy films Category:Austrian comedy films Category:German comedy films Category:Austrian films Category:West German films Category:German-language films Category:Films directed by Arthur Maria Rabenalt Category:Adultery in films Category:Schönbrunn Studios films
title: Lavender (1953 film)
